name: bible-reader-tracker
description: Track progress reading chapters and books of the Bible

scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run minify:js -s && npm run minify:css -s && npm run sw
scripts.copy: mkdir -p docs && cp index.html docs/ && cp *.png docs/ && cp *.svg docs/ && cp -r images docs/ && cp *.xml docs/ && cp favicon.ico docs/ && cp manifest.json docs/

author: ciwchris
